live_updates: This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available
38820.summary: Some customers in Selkirk are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38820.title: June 24 – Selkirk | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

38819.title: June 24 – Calgary (Silver Springs) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
